name: Flattened World: Final Boss Battle Edition
name_original: Flattened World: Final Boss Battle Edition
description:
Akai travels through a portal to find his father but discovers a dangerous parallel world.

After 30hrs of gameplay (available soon, add Flatworld to your Steam wishlist), in this game you will face the final boss and battle him with magic cards!

Defeat him in 10 turns or less, otherwise...

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

The game is meant to be played in a 720x1080 window. It may not display properly in smaller (height-wise) screen resolutions.
